languages.text: "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума, конечно же. Клан Сеттала, Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. Мне предстоит доказать, что их жертвы не были напрасны".

traits.locale_text: "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума, конечно же. Клан Сеттала, Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. Мне предстоит доказать, что их жертвы не были напрасны".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
languages.original_text: "Атлас необходимо сохранить и использовать на благо Империума, конечно же. Клан Сеттала, Тисифона и множество моих подданных уже заплатили своими жизнями за могущество, дарованное Дому Орселлио. Мне предстоит доказать, что их жертвы не были напрасны".

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It falls to me to prove that their sacrifices weren't in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behooves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behooves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「当然アトラスを保存し、帝国の利益のために使わなくてはなりません。セッタラ家、ティシフォン、多くの家臣たちはすでにオーセリオ家の力のために己の生涯を費やしています。あたくしには、その犠牲が無駄ではなかったと証明する義務があります」
languages.original_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: 「当然アトラスを保存し、帝国の利益のために使わなくてはなりません。セッタラ家、ティシフォン、多くの家臣たちはすでにオーセリオ家の力のために己の生涯を費やしています。あたくしには、その犠牲が無駄ではなかったと証明する義務があります」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “自然，圣仪必须被保存下来，为了帝国的利益服务。塞塔拉氏族、提西福涅，以及我的许多臣民，都为奥赛罗家族的力量付出了生命的代价，我必须保证他们的牺牲不会白费。”
languages.original_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: “自然，圣仪必须被保存下来，为了帝国的利益服务。塞塔拉氏族、提西福涅，以及我的许多臣民，都为奥塞罗家族的力量付出了生命的代价，我必须保证他们的牺牲不会白费。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « L'Atlas doit évidemment être préservé et ses capacités exploitées pour le bien de l'Imperium. Le clan Setthala, Tisiphone et bien d'autres de mes sujets ont donné leur vie pour permettre à la maison Orsellio de s'élever. Il est de mon devoir de m'assurer que leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain. »
languages.original_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: « L'Atlas doit évidemment être préservé et ses capacités exploitées pour le bien de l'Imperium. Le clan Setthala, Tisiphone et bien d'autres de mes sujets ont donné leur vie pour permettre à la maison Orsellio de s'élever. Il est de mon devoir de m'assurer que leur sacrifice n'aura pas été vain. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Naturalmente, debemos conservar el Atlas y usarlo en favor del Imperium. El clan Setthala, Tisiphone y muchos de mis súbditos ya han pagado con sus vidas por el poder de la casa Orsellio. Me corresponde a mí demostrar que sus sacrificios no han sido en vano».
languages.original_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, debemos conservar el Atlas y usarlo en favor del Imperium. El clan Setthala, Tisiphone y muchos de mis súbditos ya han pagado con sus vidas por el poder de la casa Orsellio. Me corresponde a mí demostrar que sus sacrificios no han sido en vano».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Natürlich muss der Atlas für das Wohl des Imperiums bewahrt und genutzt werden. Der Setthala-Clan, Tisiphone und viele meiner Untertanen haben bereits mit dem Leben für Haus Orsellios Macht bezahlt. Es geziemt sich für mich, zu beweisen, dass ihr Opfer nicht umsonst war."
languages.original_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich muss der Atlas für das Wohl des Imperiums bewahrt und genutzt werden. Der Setthala-Clan, Tisiphone und viele meiner Untertanen haben bereits mit dem Leben für Haus Orsellios Macht bezahlt. Es geziemt sich für mich, zu beweisen, dass ihr Opfer nicht umsonst war."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Doğal olarak Atlas'ı muhafaza edip İmparatorluk'un çıkarları uğruna kullanmalıyız. Setthala klanı, Tisiphone ve kullarımdan pek çoğu; Orsellio Hanesi güç kazanabilsin diye canlarından oldu. Bu fedakârlıklarının boşa gitmemesini sağlamakla yükümlüyüm."
languages.original_text: "Naturally, the Atlas must be preserved and used for the good of the Imperium. The Setthala clan, Tisiphone, and many of my subjects have already paid for House Orsellio's power with their lives. It behoves me to prove that their sacrifices were not in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Doğal olarak Atlas'ı muhafaza edip İmparatorluk'un çıkarları uğruna kullanmalıyız. Setthala klanı, Tisiphone ve kullarımdan pek çoğu; Orsellio Hanesi'nin güç kazanması için canlarıyla bedel ödedi bile. Onların bu fedakârlıklarının boşa gitmemesini sağlamak, bana icap eder."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
